title: Live Briefing: Syrian rebel leader says rebel factions will be dissolved
description: Ahmed al-Sharaa, leader of Hayʼat Tahrir al-Sham, said all fighters should be incorporated into the Defense Ministry and that “everyone will be subject to the law.”
author: Andrew Jeong, Vivian Ho, Hazem Balousha, Sammy Westfall, Abbie Cheeseman
